description: Final polish and refactoring of the Auction Price Predictor feature

userStories.title: Implement Help Modal Component
userStories.description: As a user, I want a help modal to explain how to use the auction tool.
acceptanceCriteria: Add '?' button to the page header
Include sections for: Rankings Import, Franchise Tags, Price Interpretation, Contract Lengths
Ensure modal is responsive and accessible (close on Esc, trap focus)
Add tooltips for key terms (Dynasty Weight, Scarcity, etc.)

userStories.title: Add Print-Friendly Styles
userStories.description: As a user, I want to print the auction values for offline reference during the draft.
acceptanceCriteria: Hide navigation, control panels, and buttons when printing
Ensure table rows do not break awkwardly across pages
Add a print header with League Name and Date

userStories.title: Refactor Auction Predictor Client Script
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the massive inline script in auction-predictor.astro refactored into a separate file for maintainability.
acceptanceCriteria: Extract the client-side state management and logic from src/pages/theleague/auction-predictor.astro
Move logic to new file: src/scripts/auction-predictor-controller.ts (or similar)
Ensure all functionality (state, events, rendering, updates) remains intact
Import the new script tag in the Astro page
Page load performance should remain the same or improve
userStories.notes: The file is currently over 6000 lines. Separation of concerns is needed.

userStories.title: Mobile Responsiveness Audit & Fixes
userStories.description: As a mobile user, I want the auction tool to be usable on my phone.
acceptanceCriteria: Check Player Table on mobile view (hide less critical columns like 4yr/5yr prices)
Ensure Control Panel stacks vertically on small screens
Fix any horizontal scrolling issues on 375px width
Ensure touch targets for sliders and buttons are at least 44px
